flavourText: Guards the secrets of the atom. Crack its electron shell to reveal the truth within.
Forged from ionic lattices and covalent chains. Only true understanding of forces can shatter it.
Morphs between solid, liquid, and gas at will. Master the ideal gas law to trap it.
Wields Avogadro's number as a weapon. Balance every equation or be overwhelmed.
Burns with exothermic fury. Calculate its energy to extinguish the flames.
Moves faster than any reaction. Lower its activation energy to slow it down.
Shifts and adapts to every challenge. Disturb its balance to gain the upper hand.
Lurks across the pH scale from acid to alkali. Neutralise it with precision.
Steals and gives electrons in equal measure. Track every oxidation state to prevail.
Builds endless molecular chains. Name every structure to dismantle its creations.
Commands curly arrows with deadly precision. Trace every electron pair to survive.
Guards the gateway to advanced organic chemistry. Test every functional group to pass.
Decodes molecular secrets from spectra and synthesis. Combine all your knowledge to defeat it.
